body_html: @sdmonov, that makes sense. I need to guard this step depending on whether the compiler actually supports these flags. I can send a PR soon. In the meantime you should be able to fix this using the IF(C_AVX2_FOUND) and IF(C_AVX_FOUND) clauses as used above. The files will still need to be compiled, but appending the flags could be guarded.
